title: Lando Norris: Esports isn't just a game anymore
description: Lando Norris joins the pod to talk about his controversial iRacing collision with Indy 500 champion Simon Pagenaud and the growth of esports this year.
itunes:title: Lando Norris: Esports isn't just a game anymore
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Lando Norris joins the pod to talk about his controversial iRacing collision with Indy 500 champion Simon Pagenaud and the growth of esports this year.
itunes:summary: Lando Norris joins the pod to talk about his controversial iRacing collision with Indy 500 champion Simon Pagenaud and the growth of esports this year.
content:encoded: Lando Norris joins the pod to talk about his controversial iRacing collision with Indy 500 champion Simon Pagenaud and the growth of esports this year.
